Spring for Green Sale

Shaw Floors

Spring is here, and what better time to update your floors? From April 2 to May 12, you can Spring for Green and get a rebate of up to $500 on select Shaw floors. Plus, enjoy 24 months special financing (must be credit-approved)! Choose Shaw carpet, hardwood, resilient, laminate, tile or stone, and save! See store for details. See the list of qualifying products here: https://shawfloors.com/qualifying-style-2018-spring-for-green-sale Offer Valid April 2nd - May 12th, 2018

Celebration of Light Savings Event

Hunter Douglas Window Fashions

he longer days of spring are the perfect time to promote the light-transforming benefits of Luminette Privacy Sheers and Silhoutte Window Shadings during the Celebration of Light Savings Event. These exquisite window fashions allow your customers to soften, shift and refine the light that enters their homes into beautiful illumination.

Save $100 Rebate with the purchase of 1 Luminette Privacy Sheer. Plus $100 rebate for each additional unit.

Save $100 Rebate with the purchases of 2 Silhoutte Window Shadings Plus $50 Rebate for each additional unit.

Valid for purchases made 4/14/18 - 6/25/18. The Alustra Collection products from applicable products lines are included.

See the store for more details!
